statements: UPDATE ad_creatives SET creative_name = 'New Creative Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ad_creatives SET click_through_rate = 0.75, conversions = 15 WHERE campaign_id = 100;
UPDATE ad_creatives SET creative_name='New Campaign Name', click_through_rate=0.75 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ad_creatives SET conversions=100, creative_name='Updated Creative Name', click_through_rate=0.85 WHERE campaign_id=5 AND id=3;
UPDATE ad_creatives SET ad_description = 'New update for ad one', conversion_rate = 0.75, click_through_rate = 0.6 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE test_results SET clicks = 100, conversions = 15, test_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ad_creatives SET ad_description = 'New Description', click_through_rate = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE test_results SET conversions = 25, clicks = 100, test_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE test_id = 3;
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET budget = 5000 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE ad_creatives SET creative_content = 'New Creative Content' WHERE creative_id = 3;
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET budget = 5000.00, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE ad_metrics SET clicks = clicks + 10, conversions = conversions + 2 WHERE metric_id IN (SELECT metric_id FROM ad_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01');
UPDATE ads SET ad_name='New Advertisement Name', conversions=15 WHERE id=3;
UPDATE ad_groups SET group_name='Updated Group Name', start_date='2022-09-15', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ads SET ad_creative = 'New creative for summer campaign', click_through_rate = 0.7 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE ad_groups SET start_date = '2022-09-01', end_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE group_name = 'Special Promotions';
UPDATE ad_groups SET ad_group_name = 'New Ad Group Name' WHERE ad_group_id = 1;
UPDATE ads SET status = 'Paused' WHERE ad_id = 5;
UPDATE ad_groups SET ad_group_name = 'New Name', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE ad_group_id = 1;
UPDATE clicks SET device_type = 'Mobile' WHERE user_id = 101 AND click_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
